Economics PhD Candidate at the Ohio State University

I'm an Economics PhD candidate researching Labor Economics, Health Economics, and Economics of Science and Innovation. My **research** leverages electronic health record and spatial data to study the intersection of health equity and urban nature. My **journalism** and **community** projects value the partnership between open source tools and data literacy as a way to build power and effect change.
